descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff00ff][size=4][i][b]May i introduce Penelope.  My latest contirbution to the Nexus Community which has gave so much to me.  This is a way of saying thanks!  Do not want to brag but me thinks she is beautiful.  Her name sake can be found here:https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Penelope   Would also say her namesake comes from Ms Cruz who inspires me with her great acting ability and beauty.  This preset is in no way trying to depict Ms Cruz for i would only mess that up and probably do a disservice to her as well as this community.  Thanks for your dropping by and should you like my Penelope than my efforts will have been worth while.

[img]https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/originals/3b/ee/5c/3bee5c3a1f2c1118c2c3355b785803e1.jpg[/img]


[/b][/i][/size][/color][size=3][b]Requirements:[/b]
[url=http://skse.silverlock.org]SKSE[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624]RaceMenu
[/url]or
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?]Enhanced Character Edit
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/]The Eyes Of Beauty by Gabriel Mailhot[/url] 
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/]Brows by Hvergelmir[/url][/size][url=https://www.bing.com/search?q=sghair+pack+268+or+350&qs=n&form=QBRE&sp=-1&pq=sghair+pack+268+or+3&sc=0-20&sk=&cvid=01D454941B4C497E925F76CD0DEE494A]
[/url][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64251/?]Combined Hairstyles Collection by [b]Loshirai14
[/b][/url][/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22808/?][size=3]Beauty Spot -Skyrim Warpaint-by [b]aoringo[/b][/size][/url][size=3][size=3][b]
[/b][/size][/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5701/?]RANs Eyeliner Replacer By Ran46 [/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]
KS Hairdos - Renewal[/url]
[size=3][size=3][b][u][size=3][size=3]Appearance will vary depending on the meshes/textures/ENB you use.[/size][/size]
[/u]
Recommended (Optional):[/b]
If you want her to look like screenshots bodywise,
[/size][/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]

[/b][/url][b][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71063/?]Facelight Plus by gunder[/url][/size][/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/83056/?][b][size=3]

[/size][/i][/b][/url][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#00ffff][size=4][i][b]Again i would like to thank Bethesda, The Nexus and all the wonderful modders out there who have brought so much fun to me.
